concept.title: My other file (conb)
concept.shortdesc: This is used together with linkto-concept.dita to test conref'ing. A list item in this file will be conref'ed from concept, and should appear there in the PDF output.

conbody.p: Type your text here, in conb.

linklist.title: Files related to my conref/xref test
linklist.desc: These are all of the other files used in my conref/xref test.
